aka: Little Man, Time and the Troubadour

director.name: 伊内克·史密特斯 Ineke Smits

this_title: De Kleine Man, Tijd en de Troubadour
trans_title: 小人物，时间与吟游诗人
Little Man, Time and the Troubadour
introduction: An alternative creation myth of the small Caucasian Republic of Abkhazia sheds new light on a highly topical question in a world on fire: What is a country?
chinese_title: 小人物，时间与吟游诗人
foreign_title: De Kleine Man, Tijd en de Troubadour
